main_definition: Convenience refers to the state or quality of being suitable, comfortable, and easy to use or obtain.

meanings_and_examples.example: The convenience store is open 24 hours a day for customers who need something at any time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Usefulness and practicality of an item, service, or process
meanings_and_examples.example: A self-checkout kiosk in the supermarket offers convenience by speeding up the checkout process.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Facilitating ease in accomplishing tasks or fulfilling needs
meanings_and_examples.example: Having a dishwasher provides great convenience as it saves time on manual washing of dishes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A location that offers multiple services and items, often within walking distance from home
meanings_and_examples.example: The shopping center is convenient because it has all the necessities like grocery stores, pharmacies, and banks in one place.
